response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We understand its immense value to you, estimated at $800,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This is an excellent chance for you to secure this valuable asset at a price that is higher than its intrinsic value to you, ensuring a significant return on your investment. We believe this offer presents a unique opportunity for both parties and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
